tool_description: CodeExec API is an Online Code Execution API that allows users to run arbitrary code without installing compilers/interpreters, and is much safer for those who wanted to build a service that requires running untrusted code, for example, an Online Judge or Online IDE.
name: CodeExec
title: CodeExec

api_list.name: Get Config
api_list.description: Get server configuration like maximum limits
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codeexec.p.rapidapi.com/config"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codeexec.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Language
api_list.description: Get compile command and run command of a given language id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codeexec.p.rapidapi.com/language/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codeexec.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
